name: International Conference on E-Governance, E-Business and E-Management
content: Dear & Esteemed Colleagues Greetings! We are extremely privileged to host the upcoming international conference on E-Governance, E-Business and E-Management on the above theme at Wagner College, Staten-Island, New York, United States of America. We expect leading academics, scholars and practitioners to join us at the conference and share their research outcome with fellow researchers from across the globe. The conference, of course, will be an ideal platform for sharing and gaining new knowledge on the changes, challenges and the greater opportunities available for both businessmen and the government to reap benefits in the long-run. Panel Discussion! We are also organizing panel discussions, invited presentations on topics of interest to the academic community. Topic: Research for Sustainable Future! Call for paper submissions! You are cordially invited to make contributions in the form of abstracts/full papers/ case studies and posters. Conference Objectives: E-business has the greatest potential to multiply your business many-folds provided one identifies the right opportunities. Key issues that affect high-technology industries, the best business model which can transform your business into a highly successful venture, challenges and opportunities affecting e-business projects, controlling costs and other resources, carrying out the best form of cost-benefit analysis, among other topics will be discussed at the conference. Conference Proceedings: All the abstracts/full papers and case studies submitted will be available to the delegates in the form of a conference proceedings with an exclusive ISBN number and will also be available in the form of a CD on demand.
